product_name: X-1 Trax Custom Fit Sport Headphones
long_description: The waterproof X-1 Trax Custom Fit Sport headphones offer a durable, hassle-free design and customizable, stay-put comfort to keep the tunes rocking while you run, work out or play. Sweatproof and waterproof to 3 ft. for 30 min., these headphones are easy to clean; simply rinse them off for a fresh pair of earbuds before every workout. Moldable memory wire, 5 earplug options and a cable clip create a comfortable fit that stays in place; memory wire holds its shape yet stays flexible. Angled design works with the shape of your ear for optimal fit and performance; it directs sound towards the ear canal, delivering quality audio without listener fatigue. Tangle-resistant, shielded cable helps eliminate fraying or breaking and reduces that annoying noise of your headphone cable rubbing against your shirt as you work out. The X-1 Trax Custom Fit Sport headphones come with a nylon headphone carrying pouch.
short_description: The waterproof X-1 Trax Custom Fit Sport headphones offer a durable, hassle-free design and customizable, stay-put comfort to keep the tunes rocking while you run, work out or play.
